definition: (literary) to come in quick succession/wave after wave
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 虽浮想联翩，亦不失为楚乡土建筑实状的反映。

sentences.english: That night, always let a person thoughts thronged one's mind.
sentences.chinese: 这样的夜晚，总让人浮想联翩。

sentences.english: Do self tanners keep you guessing?
sentences.chinese: 自助美黑还在让你浮想联翩？
这一发现令我浮想联翩。

sentences.english: That makes so much sense. How about Ohio attacking Kentucky?
sentences.chinese: 这使我浮想联翩。俄亥俄攻击肯塔基又如何？

sentences.english: Foreign archaeologists are arriving one after another.
sentences.chinese: 外国的考古学者们联翩而至。

sentences.english: We could not help thinking when we saw the Great Wall in China.
sentences.chinese: 看到中国的长城，我们不禁浮想联翩。

sentences.english: Pina Gallimard reverie together, be able to extricate themselves in the one-way thinking Orientalism.
sentences.chinese: 加利马尔遐想联翩，无法自拔于东方主义的单向思维。

sentences.english: The following is one of my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 以下是我的浮想联翩之一。

sentences.english: Ben: Did you just say "dry hump"?
Looking out the window of snow, I can not help but imagination.
sentences.chinese: 望着窗外的雪，我不禁浮想联翩。

definition: passing thought/an idea that comes into one's head/recollection
to fancy from afar/reverie/wild and fanciful thoughts
reverie/daydream/to be lost in wild and fanciful thoughts
variant of 聯翩|联翩[lian2 pian1]
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
variant of 流連|流连[liu2 lian2]
lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
